events.message: I have recently been involved in a car accident causing significant damage to my vehicle. I am filing a claim to start the process.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and vehicle damage details submitted by the customer.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the investigation and communication for the vehicle collision claim.
We have received your claim regarding the car accident and acknowledge it has been registered in our system for further action.
Please provide a copy of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and your driver's license to proceed with the claim investigation.
All requested documents including police report, photos, and identification have been submitted successfully by the claimant.
The investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident has officially commenced to determine liability and damage assessment.
The investigation has concluded with all findings documented, revealing the extent of vehicle damage and confirming claimant’s liability.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the estimated repair costs and the terms outlined in the insurance policy.
The customer expressed dissatisfaction with the initial settlement offer, citing concerns over inadequate coverage of damage repairs.
Due to the customer’s dissatisfaction, the claim has been escalated to a senior claims adjuster for re-evaluation.
After re-assessment, the claim has been approved with an increased settlement amount more accurately reflecting the damage.
The approved settlement payment has been processed and issued to the claimant’s bank account as agreed.
The auto accident insurance claim has been officially closed following successful payment and resolution of all outstanding matters.
The claim records and all related documents have been archived securely as per company protocol for future reference.
